name: Httpy
desc: Httpy is a simple and lightweight HTTP server written in Python. It serves static files and directories, allowing users to browse files from their local system over a network.

name: Dental Clinic Web App
desc: Dental Clinic is complete Frontend and Backend Project. this project is used to manage and control overall activities of a Dental Clinic it includes features such as: Appointment, Patients, Payment, Analytics, Chat App, Backup and much more.

name: Driver2B
desc: A driving app designed for learners and instructors to connect, manage lessons, and track progress.
